unnormalised: Arrey yaar, anik ek budget, jem'mot chartered accountant-ankuch somzot! Mhunnllear, seriously, konn chai ani samosa-khatir ₹2,34,56,789 budget karta?!
normalised: Arrey yaar, aanink ek budget, je फक्त chartered accountants-akuch somzot! Like, seriously, konn rupee don crore chovtis lakh ponchpan hazar saat she ainshiyo navad tea ani samosa khatir budget karta?!
text: Arrey yaar, anik ek budget, jem'mot chartered accountant-ankuch somzot! Mhunnllear, seriously, konn chai ani samosa-khatir ₹2,34,56,789 budget karta?!
